      local  untracked='%226F'
      local conflicted='%196F'
      local commits_ahead='%4F'
      local commits_behind='%4F'
      local stash='%125F'

      local      clean='%244F'
      local   modified='%244F'
      local  untracked='%244F'
      local conflicted='%244F'

      local commits_behind='%244F'
      local stash='%244F'

      # Otherwise show the first 12 \u2026 the last 12.
